section.p: This class contains information that Identifies whether the patient has a prior history of any reportable malignancy.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] previousHistoryOfCancer with data type Code
Identifies whether the patient has a prior history of any reportable malignancy. Possible values are No; Yes; Unknown; etc.

Contains zero or more [0..*] reportableMalignancyListEntry, where its type is Reportable Malignancy List Entry
An order, arrangement, or significance in which the reportable Malignancy takes place.

Contains exactly one [1..1] previousHistoryOfCancer with data type Code
Identifies whether the patient has a prior history of any reportable malignancy. Possible values are No; Yes; Unknown; etc.

Contains zero or more [0..*] reportableMalignancyListEntry, where its type is Reportable Malignancy List Entry
An order, arrangement, or significance in which the reportable Malignancy takes place.
